vote.title: Authorize a professional engineering services contract to provide engineering services for the development of schematics, environmental design plans, and associated design elements for the project known as “Joppa Neighborhood Pedestrian Improvements” to include a pedestrian bridge over Union Pacific Railroad’s Dallas Yard Rail Line along Linfield Road, landscape improvements along Carbondale Street (CSJ 0918-47-310), and intersection improvements at Carbondale Street and Great Trinity Forest Way (Loop 12) (CSJ 0581-01-157) - Criado & Associates, Inc., most qualified proposer of four - Not to exceed $1,115,002.78 - Financing: Carbondale Project Grant Fund ($215,002.78) and Linfield Project Grant Fund ($900,000.00)
vote.description: Authorize a professional engineering services contract to provide engineering services for the development of schematics, environmental design plans, and associated design elements for the project known as “Joppa Neighborhood Pedestrian Improvements” to include a pedestrian bridge over Union Pacific Railroad’s Dallas Yard Rail Line along Linfield Road, landscape improvements along Carbondale Street (CSJ 0918-47-310), and intersection improvements at Carbondale Street and Great Trinity Forest Way (Loop 12) (CSJ 0581-01-157) - Criado & Associates, Inc., most qualified proposer of four - Not to exceed $1,115,002.78 - Financing: Carbondale Project Grant Fund ($215,002.78) and Linfield Project Grant Fund ($900,000.00)
